subtitle: A delightful change from sandwiches for lunch!

method.text: Carefully score the top edge of the pitta bread.
Toss together the lettuce, cucumber and half the dressing. Fill each pitta pocket with the salad.

Gently grill the bacon rolls for 5 min turning once or twice. Thread the tomatoes, bacon and cheese onto two skewers and grill for 1-2 min basting with the remaining dressing. Place the kebabs into the pitta pockets and serve immediately.

title: Mediterranean style pitta pockets
